title: Influence Quality Price & Image
description: 1\.消費者がカルダノコイン（ADA）を購入する意思決定において、製品の品質、価格、ブランドイメージのうち、どれが支配的な影響を与えるか？

f6_assessments.q0: It is not clear what this proposal is actually planning to deliver for the 200,000 they are asking for for.
f6_assessments.q1: Please provide a detailed plan on what you are going to produce, a time line you are going to produce it by, and a justification for how the requested budget will be spent.
f6_assessments.q2: Please provide deliverables against which progress can be audited and provide goals against which success can be measured.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement raises a relevant question but does not address the challenge topic in a relevant relation to the Challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The described relevant experience does not explain or provide any required skills or experience of the proposer. The proposal does not provide any information how the not defined solution might be solved. The proposer requests the full amount of the available budget for the challenge without any detailed information how the budget might be used.
f6_assessments.q2: The provided information is insufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal as the proposer does not explain any roadmap or milestones on achieving his goals. Therefore, the proposer can be held accountable in regard to the submitted proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
Draft proposal.

The problem statement and solution are unclear and do not indicate a relationship to the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
Draft proposal.

The proposal doesn't have any item indicating feasibility.
f6_assessments.q2:
Draft proposal.

The proposal doesn't have any item indicating auditability.

solution: 定量的、連想的な方法論。現代のウェブサイトのアンケートデータ収集、リッカート尺度評価。妥当性と信頼性。
experience:
